column4: Hello, After looking up stuff on google, I was thinking about installing Ububtu 11.4 on a external  usb hard drive...It is is installed right now from Wubi on my windows...I guess the real question is , will I see performance increase this way ?
or should i ust put it on a 2nd internal hard drive
booting from usb will take 4 times longer i think
ty, i didnt than abut that
